Paper.Title: SenseLearner: Minimally Supervised Word Sense Disambiguation for All Words in Open Text

Section.Paragraph: This paper introduces SENSELEARNER - a minimally supervised sense tagger that attempts to disambiguate all content words in a text using the senses from WordNet. SENSELEARNER participated in the SENSEVAL-3 English all words task, and achieved an average accuracy of 64.6%.
